page.title: 04STONEHAM FARM LADDINGFORD
page.content: A RELATIVELY NEW BUSINESS HAS BEEN OPEN NOW FOR ABOUT 18 MONTHS - IT IS CALLED "UNIBAGS LTD"., AND THEY MAKE POLYTHENE BAGS FOR PACKING AND SELL DIRECT TO THE MANUFACTURING INDUSTRY. THEIR PREMISES WERE PREVIOUSLY FARM BUILDINGS INCLUDING SOME DISUSED HOUSES. AT STONEHAM WE WALKED ALONG THE FOOTPATH WHICH WE DISCOVERED WAS THE ORIGINAL TOWPATH WHICH STARTED FROM HADLOW TO HORSMONDEN AND LINKED ALL THE VILLAGES TOGETHER; IT IS STILL USED TODAY. THE ORIGINAL STONEHAM HOP FARM INCLUDED THE OLD VILLAGE GREEN WHERE FOOTBALL AND CRICKET WERE PLAYED REGULARLY.SINCE THEN IT HAS BEEN A MEADOW WITH "HOPPERS" HUTS NEAR THE RIVER AND HAS NOW BEEN CONVERTED INTO A COMPLETELY WOODED AREA.
